page.title: 08Aberystwyth car survey(cont)
page.content:
The types of vehicles (a) were as follows: (North,South,East)
{Car Estate Van Lorry Farm M'bike Other 131 9 10 2 1 3 3 99 6 23 7 1 0 1 125 10 19 3 0 4 9 ===================================== 355 25 52 12 2 7 13 ====================================={ { ___________________________________ Conclusions to survey work. The most popular car at the three locations was the Ford,closely followed by the British Leyland.We saw more British cars than any other which is not surprising.There are three garages in town which sell cars, Anthony motors sell Mazda,Meirion motors sell mainly British Leyland and West Wales sells Ford.That is probably why we saw most British cars and
